title: Like to know what font/nearest font is used?
content:
dear all. wondering if there is a close font I can use as per the billboard logo. attached, appreciate & kind thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620220738im_/http:/typophile.com/files/billboard%20logo_3819.PNG)

author: fullon

comments.content:
Part of /i rounded dot (and may be some more tiny details), it is very close (if not matching) to [Avant-Garde Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620220738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic).  
More candidates: [Futura Maxi Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620220738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/atfutura-maxi), [Graphik Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620220738/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik) (using alternate single storey /a)

Dear Ryuk,

Many kind thanks for the info. all the best.
